item.title: CVE-2024-29876|2024-03-21T13:48:29.374Z -- sentrifugo -- sentrifugo
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Sentrifugo 3.2, throughÂ /sentrifugo/index.php/reports/activitylogreport, 'sortby' parameter. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to the server and extract all the data from it.
